statements: DELETE FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat' AND genetic_type = 'GMO';
DELETE FROM characteristics WHERE trait = 'fertilizer' AND crop_id = 2;
DELETE FROM characteristics WHERE trait = 'Drought Resistant';
DELETE FROM traits WHERE trait_name = 'Drought Resistance';
DELETE FROM genetic_modifications WHERE modification_type = 'Herbicide Resistance';
DELETE FROM crop_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
